Package org.openqa.selenium.support

Annotation Interface FindBys

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({FIELD,TYPE}) public @interface FindBys
Used to mark a field on a Page Object to indicate that lookup should use a series of @FindBy tags in a chain as described in ByChained

It can be used on a types as well, but will not be processed by default.

Eg: 

 @FindBys({@FindBy(id = "foo"),
           @FindBy(className = "bar")})
